title: The Anomaly
description: A former soldier is taken captive and awakens in the back of a van where he learns that he only has less than 10 minutes to figure out how he got there.

reviews.text: Wow I am surprised at how low the ratings for this movie are. Ok, it wasn't super good movie, but it isn't that bad really, yeah I agree that fight choreography could have been better, but I liked the idea of the movie and the setting it's in too
the best movie ever I love this movie because it has a lot of action and fighting scenes also the protagonist is my idol and I just love it so go and watch
